member.name: T:FbConnectionRequestInfo
member.summary: The class FbConnectionRequestInfo holds a clumplet that is used to store and transfer connection-specific information such as user, password, and other dpb information.

member.name: M:#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class FbConnectionRequestInfo

member.name: M:#ctor(FirebirdSql.Data.Firebird.FbConnectionRequestInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class FbConnectionRequestInfo

member.name: M:Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks whether this instance is equal to another. Since connectionRequestInfo is defined specific to a resource adapter, the resource adapter is required to implement this method. The conditions for equality are specific to the resource adapter.

member.name: M:GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hashCode of the ConnectionRequestInfo.
